itemDescription: Professor of Chemistry at Heriot-Watt College

wikipedia_page.main: Prof Thomas Slater Price FRS FRSE FCS OBE (1875–1949) was a 20th-century British chemist.

link_mentions.page: List of fellows of the Royal Society P, Q, R
response: | Thomas Slater Price||15 May 1924||24 August 1875 – 29 October 1949 Physical chemist

link_mentions.page: List of fellows of the Royal Society elected in 1924

response: He was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh in 1940. His proposers were Thomas Slater Price, James Cameron Smail, James Pickering Kendall, William Ogilvy Kermack and James Sandilands. He served as Vice President to the Society 1955 to 1958.
